name: Dirt Bike Racer
description:
Dirt bike VS train race 2018 is one of the most exhilarating desert dirt bike stunt racing game on the asphalt tracks near the railway and best ever made on the App Store.

In this Dirt bike stunts train racing simulator game, perform some crazy stunts through ramps by displaying your superbike driving skills on the railway tracks.
You have played many train racing games 3D but this desert stunt bike simulator game has many thrilling challenges to race fast against the world’s fastest train. If you are tired off old fashioned superbike driving and train racing 3D games then this trail bike vs train racing adventure game is perfect for you to play and feel like as superfast train racer.
Extreme stunts heavy bike racing game provides an opportunity to become stunt master by performing some realistic mid-air stunts over the rail. Enjoy the amazing train racing 3D adventure with amazing railway tracks and city highway.
